title: Patch 6.14 FPS Issue
body: I recently purchased a new laptop and I have had it for about a week now, however ever since I started playing league on it I have had random fps drops. My normal fps in game ranges from 200-250 but randomly my fps will drop down to between 0 and 10 for a good 4 or 5 seconds at a time. My league client is 100% up to date and everything on my laptop is 100% up to date. I have even tried uninstalling league and re downloading it but I still have this issue. I read on a similar discussion that disabling sound will fix this issue but it did not. My laptop is an Acer Aspire V Nitro - Black Edition if that helps. If anyone has a solution I be very appreciative, thanks!

replies.body: Congratulations on your laptop!  Rineyy provided a good guide that may help out with your issue.  I also recommend checking our normal [FPS Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide, because there may still be undiscovered drivers or files that need to be updated with your new rig.  Please let us know if you're still having issues and we can take another look!

I set my fps cap to 80 and the movement prediction to unchecked and tested it out in a custom game. Played it for 15 minutes and no problem so it looks like your solution may have worked thank you very much! I will test it out again in a normal game tomorrow and if there is no more issues i'll report back but thank you again for the help!
Welcomed and do let us know how your normal games go! :)

I played a 20 minute aram game with no issue and after that I played a normal game that lasted about 30 minutes and about 15 minutes in ping dropped to 9 and that was the only issue. It looks like the issue is fixed for the most part besides that one incident which is good because before it would happen very often.
Edit: played another game and the issue happened a couple times :/ Still better than before but a permanent solution would be great
Did you utilize the FPS guide Porocles mentioned?
